verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Living Water, fill my thirsting soul Holy Spirit come. Bread of life, fill my aching need. Holy Spirit come.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For I am nothing, without Your love. Breathe new life in me, Then will my life bring glory unto You Holy Spirit, sweet Holy Spirit, Holy Spirit come.{/lang-eng}
